HPI 8831 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1996 Nicos Cup GT Allstar Race M. Kageyama/K. Hoshino 5th Place

Masahiko Kageyama & Kazuyoshi Hoshino finished the 1996 JGTC season in 4th place. The non-championship Nicos Cup GT All Star race was held a few weeks later, with Kageyama & Hoshino driving this Skyline. They qualified in 6th place and finished the race in 5th place.
